t: Get to know us - We are the business behind the world's brands. | Ingram Micro
s: Today, Ingram Micro has approximately 23,500 associates operating in 57 countries across six continents and has the ability to serve nearly 90% of the global population. ... Founded as Micro D in 1979, in just 10 years Ingram Micro became the first IT distributor to reach $1B in sales.

t: History | About Our Company | Ingram Micro Lifecycle
s: Recognizing Micro D.’s innovative approach to distribution in a rapidly globalizing economy, Ingram has been acquiring shares of the company for several years. They reached full ownership in 1989 and rebranded as Ingram Micro D. The new brand also expands into Europe through the purchase ...
